# autoglue Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_id` (String) Organization UUID used for X-Org-ID header.

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) User API key (X-API-KEY).
- `base_url` (String) Base URL for the Autoglue API (default: https://autoglue.glueopshosted.com/api/v1).
- `bearer_token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token for Authorization header.
- `org_key` (String, Sensitive) Org key (X-ORG-KEY). Use together with org_secret for org-scoped auth.
- `org_secret` (String, Sensitive) Org secret (X-ORG-SECRET). Use together with org_key for org-scoped auth.

## Resources

# autoglue_annotation (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue annotation.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) Annotation key.
- `value` (String) Annotation value.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique annotation ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# autoglue_cluster (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue Kubernetes cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_provider` (String) Cloud provider identifier (for example, aws, gcp, azure).
- `name` (String) Cluster name.
- `region` (String) Region to deploy the cluster into.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique cluster ID.
- `status` (String) Current cluster status as reported by Autoglue.

description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue credential (for example, a cloud account credential).
---

# autoglue_credential (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue credential (for example, a cloud account credential).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `credential_provider` (String) Provider for this credential (for example: aws, gcp, azure).
- `kind` (String) Credential kind (for example: access-key, service-account).
- `name` (String) Human-readable credential name.
- `secret` (Map of String, Sensitive) Credential secret payload as a map of key/value pairs. WARNING: values are stored in Terraform state.

### Optional

- `account_id` (String) Optional cloud account ID associated with this credential.
- `region` (String) Optional cloud region associated with this credential.
- `schema_version` (Number) Schema version for this credential's secret format.
- `scope` (Map of String) Arbitrary scope metadata (key/value tags) associated with this credential.
- `scope_kind` (String) Logical scope kind for this credential (for example: "cloud").
- `scope_version` (Number) Version of the scope metadata schema.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique credential ID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# autoglue_node_pool (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue node pool.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `apiserver_url` (String) Kubernetes API server URL for this node pool.
- `kubelet_version` (String) Kubelet version for nodes in this pool.
- `name` (String) Node pool name.
- `role` (String) Node pool role (for example: "control-plane" or "worker"). Exact values must match the Autoglue API's accepted roles.

### Optional

- `kubelet_options` (Map of String) Additional kubelet options as key/value pairs.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique node pool ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---

  Manages the set of servers attached to a node pool.

# autoglue_node_pool_servers (Resource)

Manages the set of servers attached to a node pool.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `node_pool_id` (String) Node pool ID.
- `server_ids` (Set of String) Set of server IDs to attach to the node pool.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Synthetic ID for this attachment set (node_pool_id).

# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_server Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue server.
---

# autoglue_server (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue server.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hostname` (String) Hostname of the server.
- `ssh_key_id` (String) SSH key ID associated with this server.
- `ssh_user` (String) SSH username used to access this server.

### Optional

- `private_ip_address` (String) Private IP address of the server.
- `public_ip_address` (String) Public IP address of the server.
- `role` (String) Logical role for the server. Typically one of `master`, `worker`, or `bastion`.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique server ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `status` (String) Server status as reported by Autoglue. One of `pending`, `provisioning`, `ready`, or `failed`.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_ssh_key Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue SSH keypair (public metadata only).
---

# autoglue_ssh_key (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue SSH keypair (public metadata only).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Human-readable SSH key name.

### Optional

- `bits` (Number) Key size in bits (RSA only; typically 2048, 3072, or 4096). Ignored for ED25519.
- `comment` (String) Optional key comment (e.g. deploy@autoglue).
- `type` (String) "rsa" (default) or "ed25519".

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) Unique SSH key ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `public_key` (String) OpenSSH-formatted public key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_taint Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue taint.
---

# autoglue_taint (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue taint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `effect` (String) Taint effect, for example `NoSchedule`, `PreferNoSchedule`, or `NoExecute`. See Autoglue / Kubernetes taint documentation for valid options.
- `key` (String) Taint key. Changing this forces a new taint to be created.

### Optional

- `value` (String) Taint value (optional).

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique taint ID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

## Data Sources

# autoglue_annotations (Data Source)

Lists all annotations in the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Attributes List) All annotations visible to the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--annotations))

<a id="nestedatt--annotations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `annotations`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Annotation ID.
- `key` (String) Annotation key.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `value` (String) Annotation value.

- `id` (String) Cluster ID to look up.

# autoglue_credential (Data Source)

Reads an Autoglue credential by ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Credential ID to look up.

### Read-Only

- `account_id` (String) Cloud account ID.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `credential_provider` (String) Credential provider.
- `kind` (String) Credential kind.
- `name` (String) Credential name.
- `region` (String) Cloud region.
- `schema_version` (Number) Schema version.
- `scope` (Map of String) Scope metadata associated with the credential.
- `scope_kind` (String) Logical scope kind.
- `scope_version` (Number) Scope version.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# autoglue_node_pool (Data Source)

## Schema

### Required

### Read-Only

- `kubelet_options` (Map of String) Kubelet options as key/value pairs.

# autoglue_servers (Data Source)

Lists all servers visible to the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `servers` (Attributes List) All servers visible to the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--servers))

<a id="nestedatt--servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `servers`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `hostname` (String) Server hostname.
- `id` (String) Server ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `private_ip_address` (String) Private IP address.
- `public_ip_address` (String) Public IP address.
- `role` (String) Server role (for example `master`, `worker`, `bastion`).
- `ssh_key_id` (String) SSH key ID associated with this server.
- `ssh_user` (String) SSH username.
- `status` (String) Server status as reported by Autoglue.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

page_title: "autoglue_ssh_key_download Data Source - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Downloads SSH key files by ID. WARNING: this can place private key material into Terraform state.
---

# autoglue_ssh_key_download (Data Source)

Downloads SSH key files by ID. WARNING: this can place private key material into Terraform state.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) SSH key ID to download.

### Optional

- `part` (String) Optional part selector if supported by the API (for example: `all`, `public`, or `private`). If omitted, the server default is used.

### Read-Only

- `content` (String) File content returned by the server (format depends on API; often a ZIP or PEM).

# autoglue_ssh_keys (Data Source)

Lists all SSH keys for the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

<a id="nestedatt--keys"></a>
### Nested Schema for `keys`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) SSH key ID.
- `name` (String) SSH key name.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `public_key` (String) OpenSSH-formatted public key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

page_title: "autoglue_taints Data Source - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Lists taints, optionally filtered by key, value, or query string.
---

# autoglue_taints (Data Source)

Lists taints, optionally filtered by key, value, or query string.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `key` (String) Exact taint key to filter by.
- `q` (String) Case-insensitive substring match on key.
- `value` (String) Exact taint value to filter by.

### Read-Only

- `taints` (Attributes List) All taints returned by the API. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--taints))

<a id="nestedatt--taints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `taints`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `effect` (String) Taint effect.
- `id` (String) Taint ID.
- `key` (String) Taint key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `value` (String) Taint value (may be empty).
